item.more_rpg_classes.silver_witcher_swo: Deals magic silver damage to undead targets.
item.more_rpg_classes.whitegold_witcher_: Deals magic silver damage to undead targets.
item.more_rpg_classes.meteorite_witcher_: Deals magic silver damage to undead targets.
item.more_rpg_classes.meteorite_silver_w: Deals magic silver damage to undead targets.
item.more_rpg_classes.aerondight_sword.d: Deals magic silver damage to undead targets.
The blade charges up with every hit (max. 10 charges).
Gaining damage, spell crit chance and spell crit damage.
When fully charged, deals magic damage per hit.
spell.more_rpg_classes.wild_rage.name: Wild Rage
spell.more_rpg_classes.wild_rage.descrip: Fears targets for {effect_duration} seconds and gives the caster the Rage effect.
spell.more_rpg_classes.bloody_strike.des: Deals {damage} physical-damage, heals the caster half of the dealt damage.
spell.more_rpg_classes.nordic_storm.name: Nordic Storm
spell.more_rpg_classes.nordic_storm.desc: Spinning attack, that deals {damage}_0 physical- and {damage}_1 frost-damage on targets per second.
spell.more_rpg_classes.undertow.name: Undertow
spell.more_rpg_classes.undertow.descript: Throws the axe dealing {damage} physical-damage, slows the target.
spell.more_rpg_classes.rumbling_swing.de: Jumps lightning fast, dealing {damage}_0 physical- and {damage}_1 lightning-damage
spell.more_rpg_classes.thunder_call.name: Torann´s Call
spell.more_rpg_classes.thunder_call.desc: Summons a thunderbolt from the sky that deals {damage} lightning-damage, sets targets on fire.
spell.more_rpg_classes.soulaxe_drain.des: Damages yourself, drains the souls of targets dealing {damage} soul-damage per second.
spell.more_rpg_classes.icicle_crash.name: Icicle Crash
spell.more_rpg_classes.icicle_crash.desc: Summons sharp icicles for {cloud_duration} seconds, dealing {damage} frost-damage per second.
spell.more_rpg_classes.outrage.name: Outrage
spell.more_rpg_classes.outrage.descripti: Slashes wildly, scales with rage effect, dealing {damage} physical-damage.
spell.more_rpg_classes.straight_punch.de: Powerful punch, that deals {damage} physical damage, weakens the target.
spell.more_rpg_classes.stonehand.name: Stonehand
spell.more_rpg_classes.stonehand.descrip: Gives caster the Stonehand-Effect for{effect_duration} seconds. Chance to stun targets on knuckle-attacks.
spell.more_rpg_classes.asal.name: Asalraalaikum
spell.more_rpg_classes.asal.description: Concentrated strike, deals {damage}_0 arcane- and {damage}_1 physical-damage, exhausts the caster.
spell.more_rpg_classes.barq_esna.name: Baraqijal Esna
spell.more_rpg_classes.barq_esna.descrip: Makes target vulnerable to arcane-damage, higher chance to crit on target.
spell.more_rpg_classes.burstcrack.name: Burst Crack
spell.more_rpg_classes.burstcrack.descri: Smashes the ground hard, dealing {damage} physical-damage and knock up targets.
spell.more_rpg_classes.belial_smashing.d: Charges to direction, knocking up targets and dealing {damage} physical-damage.
spell.more_rpg_classes.sonichand.name: Sonichand
spell.more_rpg_classes.sonichand.descrip: Punches continuously in the air creating vacuum, deals {damage}_0 arcane- and {damage}_1 physical-damage
spell.more_rpg_classes.arcane_blast.name: Arcane Blast
spell.more_rpg_classes.arcane_blast.desc: Charging up blasts, piercing thru {pierce} targets, dealing {damage} arcane-damage.
spell.more_rpg_classes.quen.name: Quen
spell.more_rpg_classes.quen.description: Gives you a absorption effect for {effect_duration} seconds and clears all status effects.
spell.more_rpg_classes.yrden.name: Yrden
spell.more_rpg_classes.yrden.description: Slows enemies for {cloud_duration} seconds, trapping and damaging undead creatures.
spell.more_rpg_classes.igni.name: Igni
spell.more_rpg_classes.igni.description: Compromised pyrokinetic burst that ignites enemies and deals {damage} fire-damage.
spell.more_rpg_classes.aard.name: Aard
spell.more_rpg_classes.aard.description: Telekinetic thrust that knocks targets back and deals {damage} lightning-damage.
spell.more_rpg_classes.axii.name: Axii
spell.more_rpg_classes.axii.description: Makes the target incapacitated for {effect_duration} seconds.
Deals {damage}_0 frost- and {damage}_1 lightning-damage freezes targets solid.
spell.more_rpg_classes.igni_firestream_m: Stream of fire, melts the targets armor, deals {damage} fire-damage.
spell.more_rpg_classes.rend.name: Rend
spell.more_rpg_classes.rend.description: Heavy strike that deals {damage} physical-damage, scales with adrenaline.
spell.more_rpg_classes.strong_attack.des: Strong attack with the sword, deals {damage} physical-damage.
Fast strike, deals {damage} physical-damage and cripples the targets.
spell.more_rpg_classes.whirl.name: Whirl
spell.more_rpg_classes.whirl.description: Spinning and dealing {damage} physical-damage. The more adrenaline you have, the faster you move.
